intro: Elatostema nanxiense, commonly known as the Nanxiense Elatostema, is a small herbaceous plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle species, and is characterized by its delicate, heart-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forest floors or rocky crevices. Its small white flowers are clustered in dense inflorescences, and it produces small, three-lobed fruits. Due to its limited distribution and unique morphology, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
